amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 117-366 to ensure nothing prevents community banks from opening in underserved areas in relation to this Title.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez, Vicente amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 297 - 123 (Roll no. 272).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
